entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
